code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant SCDF as Spring Cloud Data Flow
    participant App as Spring Boot App
    participant Metrics as Metrics Registry
    participant DB as PostgreSQL DB

    SCDF->>App: Trigger Task Execution
    App->>Metrics: Start task execution timer
    App->>DB: Read unprocessed records from staging_table
    DB-->>App: Return records with status='UNPROCESSED'
    App->>App: Convert data to uppercase
    App->>DB: Write to target_table
    DB-->>App: Confirm write
    App->>DB: Update status to 'PROCESSED' in staging_table
    DB-->>App: Confirm status update
    App->>Metrics: Record processed items count
    App->>Metrics: Record step execution time
    App->>Metrics: Stop task execution timer
    App-->>SCDF: Task Completion with metrics
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
